ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Greetings
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Rob, I used to play on Brell, I don t play there any more though! =/ Welcome to the egroup =) Meow. Luna/Pixy of Brell
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Rob,

I used to play on Brell, I don't play there any more though! =/ Welcome to
the egroup =) Meow.

Luna/Pixy of Brell

On Tue, 8 May 2001 rob40@... wrote:

> Hello all. I'm new to the group and relatively new to the EQ world
> as well. I'm not new to being gay (haha). I have looked at some of
> the previous post and have been amazed that there are others like me
> out there (That sounds just like I did when I first discovered that
> there were other boys and girls in the world just like me). Sorry I
> didn't mean to sound so clicheist (is that really a word?) Anyway I
> have had a couple of run ins with other players who figured out that
> I was gay, I honestly don't know how. And the experience was not
> nice at all. But hey that's the way of the world be it Norath or
> Real Life. I play on Brell and would love to meet others and group
> with them if its possible, please write and lets go out and kill
> something.
>
> Rob
>
>
>
>
> Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to http://docs.yahoo.com/info/terms/
>
>
